00084 template <typename T, typename U>
00085         T * roofof(U T::* q, U * p)
00086         {
00087                 typedef typename remove_const<typename remove_volatile<U>::type>::type unqualified_type;
00088         
00089                 return static_cast<T *>(static_cast<void *>(static_cast<char *>(static_cast<void *>(const_cast<unqualified_type *>(p))) - ptrdiff_t(static_cast<char *>(static_cast<void *>(const_cast<unqualified_type *>(& ((T *)(0)->* q)))) - (char *)(0))));
